src.utils.debug
===============

.. py:module:: src.utils.debug

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Debugging utilities module.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   src.utils.debug.pyqt_set_trace


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: pyqt_set_trace()

   Set a tracepoint in the Python debugger that works with Qt.
